desc.encryption: To prevent the password from being stored in plain text, it is encrypted using the AES-GCM algorithm.
desc.explanation: This plugin allows you to open a modal that will ask for a password when you try to enable the new core plugin "Web Viewer".
desc.sendTo: If you forgot your password, please send an email to
desc.shouldHeader: The email should have the header:
desc.uninstall: Uninstalling the plugin won't remove the password!

error.firstRun: No password has been configured. Please set a password first.
error.wrongPassword: Password doesn't match: unable to enable the web viewer.

firstRun.encryption: Please configure your password. You will need it for future changes.
firstRun.prompt: This is the first time you run this plugin.
firstRun.title: First configuration
